titles.title: Higher Education Volunteer Services Amendments Act of 1987

A bill to amend the direct student loan program under the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for partial loan cancellation for full-time volunteer service with a tax-exempt organization, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Higher Education Volunteer Services Amendments Act of 1987 - Amends provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 relating to the direct student loan program to provide for partial cancellation of such loans for service with a tax-exempt organization.
